Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Kodi sipadali nthawi imene munthu sanali kanthu kena kali konse kodziwika
Ndithudi Ife tidamulenga munthu kuchokera ku madontho a umuna umene unasakanizidwa ndi ukazi ndi cholinga chomuyesa motero Ife tidamupanga iye kukhala wakumva ndi woona
Ndithudi Ife tamulangiza njira yabwino kaya iye akhala wothokoza kapena wosathokoza
Ndithudi tawakonzera anthu osakhulupirira unyolo ndi magoli ndi moto wa lawilawi
Ndithudi anthu onse angwiro adzamwa chakumwa chosakanizidwa ndi madzi ochokera pa kasupe wa ku Paradiso chotchedwa Kafur
Kasupe amene akapolo a Mulungu adzamwapo, amene amatumphutsa madzi ochuluka
Iwo amene amakwaniritsa malonjezo awo ndipo amakhala ndi mantha ndi tsiku limene zoipa zidzasefukira ponseponse
Ndipo amapereka chakudya chifukwa cha chikondi cha Mulungu, kwa anthu aumphawi, amasiye ndi kwa akaidi
Ife tili kukudyetsani chifukwa cha Mulungu basi. Ife sitifuna malipiro kapena mayamiko kuchokera kwa inu
Ndithudi ife tiopa tsiku loopsa ndi laululu limene lidzasanduliza nkhope kuoneka monyasa, limene lili nkudza kuchokera kwa Ambuye wathu
Motero Mulungu awapulumutsa iwo ku zoipa za tsiku limeneli ndi kuwapatsa nyali yokongola kuti akhale mosavutika ndi mwachisangalalo
Ndipo mphotho yawo idzakhala munda wa Paradiso ndi zovala za silika chifukwa chopirira kwawo
Ali kukhala m’Paradiso, pamipando yawofowofo, iwo sadzamva kutentha kwa dzuwa kapena kuzizira kwambiri
Ndipo mithunzi idzakhala pafupi ndi iwo ndipo zipatso zidzalendewera mu matsanzi kuti asamavutike pothyola
Ndipo pakati pawo padzaperekedwa zikho zozungulira za siliva ndi matambula a magalasi
Matambula oonetsa zinthu zomwe zili m’kati mwake, opangidwa kuchokera ku siliva. Iwo adzathiramo chakumwa molingana ndi chilakolako chawo
Ndipo iwo adzapatsidwa chakumwa kuchokera mu zikho zodzala ndi madzi osakaniza ndi Zanjabil
Kasupe amene ali komweko wotchedwa Salsabil
Ndipo adzazunguliridwa ndi ana owatumikira a misinkhu yofanana. Ndipo ngati iwe utawaona ukhoza kuganiza kuti ndi ndolo zomwazikamwazika
Ndipo pamene iwe uona kumeneko, udzaona madalitso ndi ufumu waukulu
Iwo adzavala nsalu zokongola za silika zooneka ngati msipu zopetedwa ndi golide. Iwo adzavala zibangiri za siliva ndipo Ambuye wawo adzawapatsa chakumwa chabwino
Ndithudi iyi ndi mphotho yanu ndipo kupirira kwanu kwalandiridwa
Ndithudi ndife amene tavumbulutsa kwa iwe pang’ono pang’ono, Buku lolemekezeka la Korani
Motero pirira ndipo tsatira malamulo a Ambuye wako ndipo usamvere zonena za munthu wochimwa kapena wosakhulupirira amene ali pakati pawo
Ndipo uzilemekeza dzina la Ambuye wako m’mawa ndi madzulo
Ndi m’gawo lina la usiku, uzimupembedza Iye ndipo uzimulemekeza Iye usiku wonse
Ndithudi! Awa amakonda kwambiri moyo wa msanga msanga wa masiku ano, ndipo amaiwala tsiku limenelidzakhalalovuta
Ndifeamenetidawalengandipo tinaika mphamvu m’ziwalo zawo. Koma ngati Ife titafuna, tikhoza kulenga anthu ena kuti alowe m’malo mwawo
Ndithudi! Ili ndi chenjezo motero aliyense amene afuna, mulekeni kuti atsatire njira yoyenera yopita kwa Ambuye wake
Koma inu simudzatha kutero pokhapokha ndi chifuniro cha Mulungu. Ndithudi Mulungu ndiye Mwini kudziwa ndi Mwini nzeru
Iye adzaonetsa chisomo chake kwa aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Koma anthu ochimwa, Iye wawakonzera iwo chilango chowawa
